channel.title: Yell item
channel.description: Any ideas how to do yell cmd awailable when: i read some scroll, its gone, then its add 1 pcPoints if player cmd yell and player got 1 pcPoint, he can yell plz help

item.title: Yell item
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Deptas1599:

what u mean, Bowser?

If you have an opening bracket, it needs a closing bracket.
Example:

if(mopar.username.equalsIgnoreCase("sk8rdude461")) { System.out.println("I throw errors since I don't have a }");

And the proper version:

if(mopar.username.equalsIgnoreCase("sk8rdude461")) { System.out.println("I no longer throw errors! :D"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Yell item

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") || playerCommand.startsWith("Yell") || playerCommand.startsWith("YELL") || playerCommand.startsWith("yELL")) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() < c.muteEnd) { c.sendMessage("<shad=16745472>[XENON]</col><shad=65288>You are muted and cannot yell, Type ::appeal [Reason of appeal] to appeal your mute."); return; } else { c.muteEnd = 0; } if (Connection.isMuted(c)) { c.sendMessage("<shad=16745472>[XENON]</col><shad=65288>You are muted and cannot yell, Type ::appeal [Reason of appeal] to appeal your mute."); return; if(c.getSPoints() < 1) { c.sendMessage("You need at least 1 pc point to yell."); return; }

clickingbuttons.java

Read full topic

item.title: Yell item
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Wow guys… OP is asking this:
Is there a way I can make it so when players can only yell when they have a pcPoint.
Like, for example, if a player uses a scroll and the scroll deletes and then they’re awarded with 1 pcPoint.
Then they can use the 1 pcPoint to yell.

And the answer is yes, OP, you can.

The code (do not copy and paste this) would be similar to:

// In the click item packet...
case 1234:// The item id
     c.getItems().deleteItem(1234, 1);
     c.sendMessage("As you read the scroll it vanishes and you're awarded with 1 pc point.");
     c.setPcPoints(c.getPcPoints() + 1);
     break;

// In your yell command...
if(c.getPcPoints() < 1) {
     c.sendMessage("You need at least 1 pc point to yell.");
     return;
}
c.setPcPoints(c.getPcPoints() - 1);

Read full topic
